item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Curl-Impersonate (172 points | 37 comments)
2. From Pegasus to Predator – The evolution of commercial spyware on iOS [video] (292 points | 98 comments)
3. MiceWine – run Windows applications and games on Android smartphones (85 points | 19 comments)
4. What is it like to be a thermostat? (31 points | 31 comments)
5. A simple way to explore data through a Tableau-like UI directly in your data app (9 points | discuss)
6. Bench Accounting Acquired by Employer.com (33 points | 18 comments)
7. Limits to Growth (1972) (36 points | 25 comments)
8. Execution Units Are Often Pipelined (4 points | discuss)
9. Passkey technology is elegant, but it's most definitely not usable security (90 points | 96 comments)
10. Pincites (YC S23) is hiring a founding engineer to build legal AI agents (Remote) ( | hide)
11. Pigment Mixing into Digital Painting (315 points | 48 comments)
12. KAG – Knowledge Graph RAG Framework (158 points | 48 comments)
13. Nikon reveals a lens that captures wide and telephoto images simultaneously (112 points | 68 comments)
14. The Cody Computer (192 points | 24 comments)
15. 'Obelisks': New Class of Life Has Been Found in Human Digestive System (18 points | 1 comment)
16. PolyDye: Full color printer mod for Marlin 3D printers (92 points | 19 comments)
17. Rite Aid's 'Zombie' stores take over America (10 points | 12 comments)
18. 86Box: Emulator of x86-Based Machines (53 points | 21 comments)
19. The Zombocom Problem (204 points | 58 comments)
20. Chess grandmaster Magnus Carlsen rejoins tournament he quit over wearing jeans (20 points | 28 comments)
21. Wishing Everyone a Happy Solsthelion (29 points | 19 comments)
22. Apple and Meta go to war over interoperability vs. privacy (60 points | 66 comments)
23. Build a working game of Tetris in Conway's Game of Life (2014) (231 points | 27 comments)
24. Against the Hydraulic Analogy (29 points | 17 comments)
25. Overloading the lambda abstraction in Haskell (2022) (44 points | 7 comments)
26. Neuters: Lightweight front end to Reuters News (85 points | 45 comments)
27. Issues with object-oriented programming in Guile (2022) (41 points | 4 comments)
28. Trying to use Bluesky without getting burned again (248 points | 444 comments)
29. The last Inca bridge master (130 points | 27 comments)
30. When Zig Is Safer and Faster Than Rust (73 points | 23 comments)
